comment: easy class

Overall great class. We had 3 easy tests that came with a speaking portion as well. We also had 3 projects that you could either work on alone or in a group of 2-3 people. Each week there's a short assignment that takes ten minutes max and it's based on the lecture from that week. As I said, easy class, and just make sure to go to class.

She is absolutely incredible. I have severe social anxiety, but whenever I was in her class, I felt very comfortable speaking and almost had no anxiety whatsoever. Only reason I got a B was because I forgot to post one of my projects.
She is super nice. She takes attendance for a grade though and is very hard to reach outside of class.
Professor Graf was one of my favorites here at KSU! Seriously, take her if you get the chance. Her class was so interactive, and it really helped me improve.
Take her!! The assignments are very easy even if you aren't a native Spanish speaker. She will help you with anything. Just do the work, don't stress about it! Take her trust me.
Take her. Easy A even if you don’t know Spanish. Test are easy literally just remember the bits here and there from the powerpoint she goes over in class and you’ll be straight.
Really easy A. You just have to flip through a Powerpoint once a week and then record a 3-4 sentence statement on the week's topic. Profe Graf gives good feedback and is super sweet!

Tests are open note. Gives lots of grades and will let you make up any 0's you have at the end of the semester. If you show up to class, you will get an easy "A". Super easy class and GREAT professor, HIGHLY recommend!! She also brings donuts to class every now and then :)
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Graf is by far one of the best professors i have had. She is kind, funny, and makes every lecture interesting. Dont be worried if youre not that good at Spanish, because her easy assignments make it easy to learn. Group projects are rare but actually pretty fun. I will definitely be looking for an opening in her class again for extra electives.

Very very nice professor, loved taking her class. Much easier than other Spanish profs I've taken, her classes helped me understand and implement what we were learning more. Weekly assignments were very easy, we did a lot of easy group projects in class which made us actually kinda use spanish. Super nice and enjoyed seeing her every week.

This was one of those do the work you get an A class. If you are taking just for the credit this is the class for you! Seems very nice, but haven't had much interaction with her. Weekly powerpoints and activities through seesaw. A few test (multiple choice part and speaking part) - only taken 1 and got a 100. Going to have a project at end also.

Profe Graf made it very simple to keep up in her class. Despite having to go online for the Fall 2020 semester, she made a real effort to keep us engaged and have fun. Very quick to respond to emails. Tests are easy as long as you take notes and pay attention. The final is a group project, but she lets you work alone if you want. Gracias, Profe!!!

This class was easier because it was online, but I felt like I was not learning Spanish, but rather doing the bare minimum for the assignments with gaining very little Spanish grammar or comprehension skills. I was hoping it would be a mix of English and Spanish to teach us, but almost EVERYTHING was in Spanish, so it was harder to learn.

I cannot give her enough praise. Professor Graf was genuinely so kind and helpful. She actually inspired me to be a Spanish minor because of how much her class made me enjoy the language. If you need to take a Spanish class, always go with her.
Señora Graf definitely passes the vibe check. Super sweet, understanding, and willing to work with her students as long as they put effort in her class.

I absolutely love Professor Graf. She loves her job and makes spanish easy to learn. I strongly recommend! You wont have to study at all. Just take good notes! I will take her class over and over if I could.
As long as you put in effort, you'll do great. She's a really nice teacher who makes learning Spanish fun.

Profesora Graf is hands down one of the best Spanish teachers I've ever had. You learn a lot of vocabulary and she makes class very fun! As long as you pay attention in class and take good notes you will do well on exams and group projects. I wish she taught more lower level Spanish classes so I could take her for everything!
Profe Graf is AMAZING! I loved her class! Learned so much and had a ton of fun! Would HIGHLY recommend! Weekly online discussions, three exams, three group projects, and a final.

An amazing professor! She makes coming to class fun and worth the time. Expect to do a lot of group projects and group discussion on the daily. Grading is easy and weekly discussion posts are brief and easy to complete. Take her!

I love Profesora Graf! She mainly speaks Spanish in class, but she speaks English to us when it's important or she knows we do not understand. Her class is fun and there is a lot of good discussions and activities. I plan on taking her in the future.

Señora Graf is one of the best professors I have ever had. She is kind and very patient when you are speaking and presenting. Everyone has a lot of fun and I would recommend anyone who needs spanish to take her.

She is honestly incredible. I am taking her this semester and I love coming to this class. She is hilarious, incredible and making sure everyone knows what is going on, and she is pretty. Fantastic woman! We had a few tests, and there is a very brief discussion post due every Monday. Take her!

She is one of those professors that is genuinely interested in helping you learn and succeed in her class. She is very helpful with all assignments and doesn't put too much pressure on everything being perfect as long as you make an actual effort. I love going to this class everyday. Definitely try to get her as your professor :-)

If you are minoring in spanish and want to take a spanish 3 & 4 class take prf. Graf. She is very caring and understanding. You have daily diarios that are graded throughout the semester and mon-thur class meetings. Test's are written or group projects. You will learn a ton from her. I will def. take her in the future if possible.

She is an amazing professor. I love how she doesn't pressure us to use spanish, but encourages it. The assignments and tests aren't bad. Just go to class to keep up with material. Expect to be partnered up with those sitting next to you.
Professor Graf is so nice, Take her . I always had a hard time in Spanish, but i really enjoyed this class. You will learn a lot  and you will enjoy learning a new language!!!!

Graf always made class a ton of fun, first part is going through the PowerPoint and talking about relevant college things like Netflix or parking troubles. The last part of class was going over the textbook for maybe 15 minutes or so. Super funny, easy to understand, helpful, tests aren't hard at all. I always looked forward to going, TAKE HER!!!!!

Pen pal assignments over email, twitter projects, group presentation only a minute long video, 3 tests. Class was fun even though it was an early class. Last class we brought food and drinks and watched funny group presentation videos. She is fun and relates the lecture to the present day events. Take her if you have to take any Spanish classes!
go to class and actually do the assignments, you'll get an a

Sra. Graf is so sweet and I really liked her class. There wasn't much writing even though it is supposed to be a writing course, but she made it fun and interesting every day. I laughed so much in her class. Easy A

Easy class, but very interesting and relevant. Profesora Graf really knows her stuff, and makes class a lot of fun. Tests are easy - open notes, open book, open internet (but not online translators like Google Translate). They're tests on the concepts learned in class rather than vocab or information. I highly recommend this class!

I never post anything on this site, but i will for this professor. Sra. Graf is simply the BEST Spanish teacher anyone can take. i have taken her five semesters and im only required to take Spanish for 2. Easy, fun, simple to undersdtand, knows you dont have all day to dedicate to her class alone, polite, funny, respectful, and did I say FUN?

She was very helpful! No homework at all. She tells you exactly what's going to be on the test. The projects were really easy and you will learn A LOT! She creates a nice atmosphere to learn in. TAKE HER :)
She is awesome! She speaks the language in class and is very helpful. Take her if you get the chance!

The BEST professor I have had while attending KSU and I am not a Spanish major! I have had 2 other spanish professors at KSU that were horrible but she is so much fun and energetic. She really knows how to make everyone interested in the language and culture. She is also very kind and understanding.
best Spanish professor at KSU, makes class fun and easy, I've taken her twice already and am taking her again this summer. HIGHLY recommend
She is AMAZING. All I can say is just take her.

So much fun! She really loves what she teaches and she makes the language exciting to learn. Weekly posts online that are super easy, only a handful of writing assignments and fair tests with study guides. Highly recommend for everyone!

I took Graf for Span 1002-2002. She was THE BEST teacher i've ever had. Very considerate and understanding. Extremely easy to communicate with. She understands that not everyone "gets" the language, and she makes it applicable. Her "Palabra del Dia" Or word or the day, gives real world application to Spanish.

SHE IS THE BEST SPANISH TEACHER EVER. IVE HAD HER FOR 3 SEMESTERS STRAIGHT AND GOT IN A IN ALL OF THEM! SHE MADE ME WANT TO DOUBLE MAJOR IN SPANISH! Her tests are very straight forward and she explains clearly what she expects. Youre allowed to miss 2 absences. If you want to have fun learning and enjoy Spanish I would deff take her! Easy A!!

The. Best. Spanish. Professor. EVER. This is my third semester taking her and have passed with an A in every class. Class is never boring. Although you wouldn't really need to go to class to do well, attendance is mandatory. She's very lenient and easy-going. Her sections always fill up quick. That's how GREAT she is!

Professor Graf is the best spanish teacher I've ever had! Very nice and helpful. Helps you learn the language instead of memorize words. Great teacher, very funny- class is never boring! Easy A, straight forward tests.

Super easy class.  Graf is really nice.  I didn't learn a tun because the classroom environment is a little too relaxed.  Grades very easily.  Focuses on group discussions in class mainly.  I wouldn't recommend if you're planning to pursue this degree, but it's a fun class.  I didn't learn nearly as much as I should have.

BEST spanish professor I've ever had. She makes it fun and interesting. She grades extremely fairly and she is so nice. The whole semester is great, work load is not bad at all, and she is very understanding. If you're thinking of doing Spanish major, after this class you will want to do it!!!

OMG BEST TEACHER EVER!!!!! The class was so fun. It was an 8am, and i'm not a morning person but there's no way to sleep in this class just coz its so engaging and fun! Attendance does count!  EASY EASY A!! would totally take her again her class currently didnt have -6 ppl in the availability! lol =D
This teacher is amazing! She makes Spanish fun and easy. I loved having her. You are guaranteed at least a B if not an A. I would definitely retake her if I could. :)
SHE SHOULD RUN FOR MAYOR!!!! loved her class. It was crystal clear. Best Spanish teacher in the WORLD!! **EASY A, EASY A, EASEY A** take her

By far the best Spanish professor at KSU, and one of the best I've ever had. I had this class early in the morning and I still thoroughly enjoyed going, which is saying a lot. She grades very easily and on what seems to be a self improvement basis. I learned a ton without even realizing I had. Take her for a useful, entertaining, quality class

Sra. Graf is the BEST SPANISH TEACHER EVER. Her classes are almost completely in Spanish, but she speaks so you can understand what she's saying even if you're not confident  about your spanish. She grades very easily! You get credit for completing it and even if you get an answer wrong on a test you get partial credit. And she looks like Shakira.
Great professor. I had her last semester. I'd take her again.

She is GREAT! Such an easy class. Speaks mostly in Spanish, but you can understand every word she's saying. Easy assignments, 2 tests that she makes herself, and she gives you a study guide with EVERYTHING on the test, and final is dept final, that's a nightmare, but every Spanish class has that. I would definitely take her again!

Professor Graf rocks! her class is awesome. She conducts the class in Spanish most of the time, but was very animated and easy to understand. She explains assignments in English, so all assignments are clear. She brought us chips and guacamole which is great. Plus she's lenient when it comes to turning things in late and she gives extra credit.

Professor Graf was excellent! I loved going to her class. She made it fun, and engaging, while still teaching us a lot! She is very animated, and seems to love what she does! TAKE HER TAKE HER TAKE HER!!!!!

Prof Graf is the best! she is awesome and made my love of spanish even stronger. yes i should have taken a higher spanish but she was very thorough & gave extra credit.easy A even without spanish background.TAKE HER!she is one of the best! she also is not that strict on attendance she claims to have a 5 absence limit then drops grade but i missed 7

Graf is really awesome. She is very knowledgable and helpful and is able to recognise your personal level of knowledge when it comes to spanish. She is also very enthusiastic about the subject, so it makes class more fun. Speaks in spanish most of the time, and requires in class participation. You catch on very quickly and I was able to learn a lot

Great professor. Tests are fairly easy and straightforward. Some of the homework is optional. Tries to make the class more fun with some interactive activities. Requires a lot of speaking excersises in her class though.

Great professor. Tests are fairly easy and straightforward. Some of the homework is optional. Triea to make the class more fun with some interactive activities. Requires a lot of speaking excersises in her class though.
